summary: Labor booking app where laborers can book services from neighboring laborers
architectural_notes: User type: Laborers (both service providers and consumers)
Core functionality: Peer-to-peer labor booking marketplace
Each laborer should have a unique labour ID for identification
known_issues: Booking service not working after Version 7 deployment
Outgoing bookings not appearing in booking section after successful booking creation
Target laborer outgoing service is not generating
Version 12 - Multiple components/features not functioning after deployment

existing_features.title: Build user authentication system using Internet Identity for laborers to securely log in and manage their profiles
Create a laborer profile management page where users can view and edit their profile information, services offered, and availability
Build a neighbor laborer discovery interface that displays nearby laborers with their skills, availability, and allows filtering by service type and location
Create a booking request interface where laborers can select another laborer, choose service details, specify date/time, and submit booking requests
Build a bookings dashboard showing both outgoing booking requests (requests made to others) and incoming booking requests (requests received from others) with status indicators and action buttons
Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, professional colors and clear typography that conveys trust and accessibility for labor workers, avoiding blue and purple color schemes
Add a detailed booking view page that displays comprehensive information for a single booking including laborer details, service information, date/time, duration, location, status, and timestamps
Implement booking details entry form that allows laborers to add or edit additional notes, special instructions, or requirements for an existing booking
Add navigation from the bookings dashboard to individual booking detail pages with deep linking support
Enhance the bookings dashboard with filtering and sorting capabilities including filter by status (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled) and sort by date
Add a booking history section to the dashboard that shows completed and cancelled bookings separately from active bookings

Investigate and fix the booking creation mutation in useQueries.ts that causes indefinite buffering when submitting booking requests, ensuring the mutation completes successfully and returns appropriate success or error states
Add error handling and timeout logic to the createBooking backend call in CreateBookingPage.tsx to prevent indefinite waiting states and provide user feedback if the request fails or times out
Debug and resolve the infinite loading state on the booking creation page that prevents booking requests from completing successfully
Add comprehensive logging to the createBooking mutation flow in useQueries.ts to capture request lifecycle, response data, and any errors or timeouts
Add explicit timeout handling to the createBooking mutation in CreateBookingPage.tsx that triggers after 10 seconds and displays a user-friendly error message if no response is received

Debug and fix the element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/a[1] in the booking creation page (CreateBookingPage.tsx) that is not functioning correctly. Investigate click handlers, navigation logic, and any associated state management to ensure the element performs its intended action.

Add comprehensive error logging and user feedback for the element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/a[1] to capture any failures, including event listener errors, navigation failures, or state update issues.

Debug and fix the 'labour not found' error displayed on the booking creation page (CreateBookingPage.tsx) by investigating the laborer data fetching logic, verifying the laborId parameter is correctly passed and parsed, and ensuring the backend getLaborerById function returns the correct laborer data

Add comprehensive error logging to the CreateBookingPage.tsx laborer data fetching flow to capture the laborId parameter value, query execution status, backend response, and any error details to aid in debugging the 'labour not found' issue

Debug and fix the outgoing booking history display in BookingsDashboard.tsx that is not functioning correctly while incoming history works perfectly. Investigate the data fetching logic for outgoing bookings, verify the filtering logic correctly identifies bookings where the current user is the requester, and ensure completed and cancelled outgoing bookings are properly displayed in the BookingHistorySection component.

Add comprehensive error logging to the outgoing booking history data flow in BookingsDashboard.tsx to capture the current user's principal, the filtering logic for outgoing bookings, the number of bookings retrieved, and any data inconsistencies that prevent outgoing history from displaying correctly.

Investigate and debug the complete booking creation flow from CreateBookingPage.tsx through useQueries.ts to backend/main.mo createBooking function to identify why the booking service stopped working after Version 7 deployment, examining state persistence, actor initialization, query invalidation, and mutation handling

Add comprehensive error logging to the createBooking mutation in useQueries.ts to capture the full request payload, backend actor state, authentication status, and detailed error responses including any network failures or actor initialization issues

Add timeout protection to the createBooking mutation in CreateBookingPage.tsx that triggers after 15 seconds, logs the timeout event with full context, and displays a user-friendly error message instructing users to retry their booking request

Test the complete booking creation flow end-to-end including form submission, backend processing, success navigation, and verify that bookings appear correctly in the BookingsDashboard outgoing requests section immediately after creation

Add real-time user feedback in CreateBookingPage.tsx showing booking creation progress with loading states, submission confirmation, and clear error messages if the booking fails, ensuring users understand the current state of their request at all times

Debug and fix the button element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/button[2] that is not functioning correctly. Investigate the button's click handler, event listeners, disabled state, form submission logic, and any associated state management to identify and resolve why the button does not perform its intended action when clicked.

Add comprehensive error logging to the button element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/button[2] to capture click events, event handler execution, any validation failures, state changes triggered by the button, and error conditions that prevent the button from functioning properly.
Update the ProfilePage.tsx laborer profile form to include a mobile number input field that allows users to enter and edit their contact phone number
Display the labour ID prominently on the ProfilePage.tsx for each laborer, showing it as a read-only identifier field that helps users reference their unique ID
Add mobile number display to the DiscoveryPage.tsx laborer cards so users can see contact information when browsing available laborers
Display both the provider's and requester's mobile numbers in the BookingDetailPage.tsx to facilitate direct communication between the two parties involved in the booking

Verify that the createBooking mutation in useQueries.ts properly invalidates the booking queries cache after successful creation, ensuring the BookingsDashboard refetches and displays the new outgoing booking immediately

Debug and fix the outgoing service generation issue in BookingsDashboard.tsx where bookings created for a target laborer (where the current user is the requester) are not appearing in the outgoing requests section, investigating the booking data flow from creation through query refetch and display logic

Add comprehensive debug logging to the BookingsDashboard.tsx component to track the complete data flow for outgoing bookings, including query fetch status, booking array contents, principal comparisons for classification, and timing of re-renders after booking creation

Investigate and fix any timing issues or race conditions in BookingsDashboard.tsx that might prevent newly created bookings from appearing immediately in the outgoing requests section, ensuring proper React Query cache synchronization

Debug and fix the element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1] in BookingsDashboard.tsx that is responsible for displaying outgoing bookings. Investigate why bookings created by the current user (where they are the requester) are not appearing in this section after successful booking creation. Verify the booking classification logic correctly identifies outgoing bookings by comparing the booking's requesterId with the current user's principal.

Add comprehensive debug logging to the element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1] to capture the complete data flow for outgoing bookings display. Log the raw bookings array received from the query, the current user's principal used for filtering, the filtering logic execution results showing which bookings are classified as outgoing, the final filtered array count, and any render conditions that might hide the element.

Investigate and fix any React Query cache synchronization issues in BookingsDashboard.tsx that prevent the outgoing bookings element from updating after booking creation. Verify that the 'bookings' query is properly invalidated after the createBooking mutation succeeds, ensure the query refetch completes before the dashboard renders, and check for any race conditions between navigation to the dashboard and query data availability.

Add emergency diagnostic logging to all frontend pages (LandingPage, ProfilePage, DiscoveryPage, CreateBookingPage, BookingsDashboard, BookingDetailPage) that captures component mount status, query states, authentication status, actor initialization, and any error conditions on page load
Investigate and fix any routing issues in App.tsx that prevent navigation between pages or cause pages to fail to render, including route configuration, lazy loading errors, and navigation guards
Verify that Internet Identity authentication in useInternetIdentity.ts is functioning correctly, including login flow, identity persistence, principal extraction, and logout functionality

Add a system health check page or component that displays the operational status of all critical system components including authentication, backend actor, data queries, and provides actionable error messages when components fail
Replace all dollar sign ($) currency symbols with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) throughout the frontend application
Update all price input fields and displays across ProfilePage.tsx, CreateBookingPage.tsx, BookingDetailPage.tsx, and DiscoveryPage.tsx to show INR symbol (₹) and use appropriate INR formatting

new_feature_requests.summary: Labor booking system - laborers can book services from other laborers
Neighbor-based laborer discovery and booking
Create a backend data model for laborers that stores profile information including name, skills/services offered, location, contact details, and availability status

Implement backend booking system that allows laborers to create booking requests for other laborers, including service type, date/time, duration, and status tracking (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
Create neighbor discovery functionality that filters and displays laborers based on proximity or neighborhood location
Verify the backend createBooking function in main.mo properly handles all edge cases and returns responses promptly without hanging, including validation of required fields and proper error responses
Verify the backend createBooking function in main.mo returns responses promptly and handles all error cases without hanging, including validation errors for missing or invalid fields

Verify the backend getLaborerById function in main.mo correctly retrieves laborer data and returns null only when the laborer genuinely does not exist, ensuring proper handling of Principal-based lookups and state access
Fix outgoing booking history display - not working while incoming history works correctly
Fix booking service - not working after deployment

Verify the backend createBooking function in main.mo correctly handles booking creation requests, validates all required fields (laborerId, serviceType, scheduledDate, duration, location), properly stores booking data in state, and returns success responses with the created booking ID
Generate and assign a unique labour ID for each laborer in the system
Add mobile number field to laborer profiles and booking communication section

Add a unique labour ID field to the Laborer type in backend/main.mo that is automatically generated and assigned when a new laborer profile is created, ensuring each laborer has a unique, human-readable identifier (e.g., 'LAB-00001', 'LAB-00002') that can be used for reference and communication
Add a mobile number field to the Laborer type in backend/main.mo to store contact information for each laborer, including validation for proper phone number format

Debug and fix the outgoing bookings display issue in BookingsDashboard.tsx where outgoing bookings do not appear after successful booking creation, investigating the booking classification logic, principal matching, query refetching, and ensuring newly created bookings immediately appear in the outgoing requests section

Add comprehensive logging to the BookingsDashboard.tsx outgoing bookings filtering and rendering flow to capture when bookings are fetched, how they are classified as outgoing, and any timing issues that prevent immediate display after creation
Add photo upload functionality to the profile section so laborers can upload their photo for identification
Fix target laborer outgoing service generation issue - outgoing services are not being generated for the target laborer

Verify that the createBooking mutation in useQueries.ts properly triggers query invalidation for the 'bookings' query key after successful booking creation, ensuring the BookingsDashboard automatically refetches and displays the new outgoing booking

Perform comprehensive end-to-end testing of all critical user flows including authentication, profile management, laborer discovery, booking creation, and bookings dashboard to identify which specific features are broken in Version 12

Verify that the backend actor in useActor.ts is initializing correctly with proper authentication state and that all backend canister functions (getUserProfile, getLaborerById, createBooking, getAllBookings) are accessible and responding
Debug and fix any React Query configuration issues in main.tsx that might cause queries to fail or not execute, including query client settings, stale time, cache time, and retry logic
Check for any TypeScript compilation errors, missing dependencies, or build configuration issues that might cause runtime failures after Version 12 deployment
Change currency from dollar ($) to Indian Rupee (INR/₹) throughout the application for all pricing displays
Update all price-related data models in backend/main.mo to store and return prices in INR instead of dollars
